services_description: AI/ML consulting, custom software development, and data engineering

icp.description: Mid-market B2B SaaS companies looking to leverage AI/ML in their products

qualifying_questions: Does this look like a real business need vs. a student/personal project?
Is there budget indication or enterprise context?
Is the request aligned with our core services (AI/ML, software, data)?
Does the company size/stage match our target market?
custom_instructions: Pay special attention to leads from the FinTech and HealthTech sectors as these are priority verticals.
